org.jcatapult.email.service
Interface TimeCommand

public interface TimeCommand

This interface defines time metrics for waiting for emails to be sent.

Author:
Brian Pontarelli

Method Summary
 Email milliseconds()
          The time frame is in milli-seconds.
 Email seconds()
          The time frame is in seconds.
 

Method Detail

seconds

Email seconds()
              throws ExecutionException,
                     TimeoutException,
                     InterruptedException
The time frame is in seconds.

Returns:
The email if it was sent within the amount of time, or an exception is thrown.
Throws:
ExecutionException - If the execution of the send fails.
TimeoutException - If the duration times out without sending.
InterruptedException - If the thread used to send the email is interrupted.

milliseconds

Email milliseconds()
                   throws ExecutionException,
                          TimeoutException,
                          InterruptedException
The time frame is in milli-seconds.

Returns:
The email if it was sent within the amount of time, or an exception is thrown.
Throws:
ExecutionException - If the execution of the send fails.
TimeoutException - If the duration times out without sending.
InterruptedException - If the thread used to send the email is interrupted.
